column5: Ever since I started on this site I have been seeing postings on the fishing teams and I finally am curious to find out what the teams are fishing for and how to participate in this "event" with the other members.  So, can a new person join an existing team? Can a new team be formed? Whats the total scoop on them?  I'm probably not alone in wondering this so maybe it can be explained to those of us who have recently discovered this site.
Here ya go!  Check out this thread.  Rick will assign you to a team if you are interested.  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=1634
Just curious, is thier going to be a deadline registration date? I know a member that wants to participate in it and he thinks it's too late.
